metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28090 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Tor before 0.4.5.7 allows a remote attacker to cause Tor directoryauthorities to exit with an assertion failure, aka TROVE-2021-002.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28090` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.2.9.14-1ubuntu1~16.04.3+esm1
tor-geoipdb - 0.2.9.14-1ubuntu1~16.04.3+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tor package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.9.14-1ubuntu1~16.04.3+esm1').
